column1: '''''Essays and Studies'' 1953''' is a collection of essays (Volume Six of the ''New Series of Essays and Studies Collected for the English Association by Geoffrey Bullough''). It includes "[[The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth
column2: The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth Beorhthelm's Son]]" - (pp.[1]-18) by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
